column4: Hi everyone - I am having some problems with screen resolution. I installed Feisty with a Radeon 9800 and a Samsung Syncmaster 243 (24-inch) and all I get is 1024x768. Any ideas?
I have the same problem, we have to sit in line :D
- my first time on here, so I don't know the protocol  :-)  I'll wait patiently  :-)
I was up until 5am lastnight configuring the prompt, resolution takes a long time
